name: Samuel Slater
description:
This is the story of the father of the American Industrial Revolution.

Dreaming big in the winter of 1790, Sam had a plan. He was going to make it big in America. How? By bringing over every industrial textile secret he could memorize. 

Before making it to the land of the free, Samuel had one last factory to make it to. Here a new invention that would change the textile industry forever. 

Crompton's Spinning Mule

Controls:

WASD/Analog stick: Move
